column2: good portions. I had the brisket and the pork ribs. Both had excellent flavor and the brisket is exactly as good as all these other reviews say it is. The mac and cheese is spectacularly creamy
column3: the corn is flavorful. My dining companion had the turkey and pulled pork and raved about both. He didn't even bother to use the extra sauce provided
column4: the meat stood on its own. He loved the mac and cheese as well but felt the corn may have been a touch overdone. All and all some of the best BBQ we've had.
